user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill my need for comfortable, breathable underwear that accommodates my body shape and keeps me feeling fresh throughout the day.
purchase_reason: I was looking for comfortable underwear that would fit my curves and provide all-day comfort. The cotton-mesh fabric and comfort-covered waistband were key features that attracted me, as I have been struggling to find suitable options that are both comfortable and supportive. My previous experiences with other brands influenced my decision, as I wanted to avoid the discomfort I had faced with nylon alternatives.

I was drawn to the nice material and the fit of these panties. The bamboo viscose fiber promised comfort, and I appreciated the fabric-covered waistband that would prevent pinching. Although I had some concerns about the leg openings being a bit large, the overall feel and fit were satisfactory, which made me feel confident in my choice.

Living in a warm climate, I needed breathable underwear that would keep me cool. The breathable micro-mesh fabric and the promise of comfort were significant factors in my decision. I had a positive experience with the fit and durability of the product, which reinforced my choice to purchase these panties.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are comfortable, well-made, and durable. I value items that fit well and are designed for ease of use, such as clothing that maintains its shape after washing and accessories that serve their purpose effectively. I appreciate features like moisture-wicking fabrics and expandable waistbands, which enhance comfort and functionality. Additionally, I tend to favor products that are lightweight and suitable for warm climates. On the other hand, I dislike items that do not fit properly or are poorly designed, leading to discomfort or inconvenience. I also have a preference for all-cotton materials, as I find them more comfortable than synthetic alternatives. Overall, I look for quality and practicality in my purchases.

conversation.content: I want to find comfortable and breathable underwear that fits my body well and keeps me feeling fresh all day long. within my expected price range: [17.99, 29.48]
What specific style or design do you prefer in underwear?
I prefer underwear that is comfortable, breathable, and fits my body well to keep me feeling fresh throughout the day. I value materials like cotton and features like moisture-wicking fabrics.
What is your preferred size or fit when it comes to underwear?

I prefer underwear that is comfortable, breathable, and fits my body well to keep me feeling fresh throughout the day. I value materials like cotton and features like moisture-wicking fabrics. A good fit is essential for me to ensure both comfort and functionality.
What color or colors do you prefer for your underwear?
I tend to prefer neutral colors like black, white, or nude for my underwear. These colors are versatile and easy to match with different clothing options.
What is your preferred underwear brand or brands that you trust for quality and comfort?

I prefer underwear brands that prioritize quality and comfort, such as Calvin Klein, Victoria's Secret, or Tommy John. These brands have a reputation for producing comfortable and well-made underwear that fits well and lasts long.
What is your preferred underwear size or fit to ensure it meets your comfort and functionality requirements?

I prefer underwear that is comfortable, breathable, and fits my body well to keep me feeling fresh throughout the day. I value materials like cotton and features like moisture-wicking fabrics. A good fit is essential for me to ensure both comfort and functionality.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Hi Panties Pack, Moisture-Wicking High-Cut Brief Underwear (Colors May Vary)> / Item ID: B0BRT5PMTX / Price: $17.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["For the leaner, longer, sexier look you want, try Hanes® high-cut cotton briefs. You'll love the silhouette, styled with hi-cut legs and full-coverage front and back, plus the comfort of no-ride-up leg bands that stay in place. These quality essential panties are made with Hanes® Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture from your skin to keep you cool and dry all day. This Hanes®-best underwear has a narrow no-pinch logo waistband that's ultra soft for comfort where you need it most. Plus the cotton is preshrunk so the size you buy is the size they stay. These high-cut cotton briefs from Hanes® are available in convenient stock-up 6-packs in assorted colors."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Panties, Cotton Brief Underwear Multi-Pack (Retired Options)> / Item ID: B0BRJSSTPD / Price: $17.44 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If briefs are your style, you can't do better than Hanes® best lightweight cotton briefs. This comfy brief underwear is made with Hanes® Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture from your skin to keep you cool and dry all day. Plus these undies are made of ring-spun cotton that's oh so soft against your skin. You'll also appreciate the plush waistband that won't pinch or bind. The silhouette is a classic brief with full coverage in front and back plus a high-rise waist for a sleek, smooth look under clothes. These lightweight briefs have comfort leg bands that stay in place without riding up and are available in a convenient 3-pack of assorted colors. Even better, these classic brief undies are tagless for itch-free comfort."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Assorted Boyshort Underwear> / Item ID: B0BB767B8M / Price: $10.49 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["The Hanes Women's Cotton Boyshort Underwear come in a convenient pack of 6 pairs. They offer it all-comfort, fit and style. You'll also love features like the breathable ultra soft ring spun cotton and an ultra soft, plush back waistband that won't pinch or bind and no-ride-up leg bands that stay in place. Plus, tag-free label means freedom from annoying, scratchy tags. Designed with excellent coverage, these panties come in an assorted color pack, colors may be different than shown in the image. The boyshort style provides full coverage front and back.. Don't compromise on comfort, style and fit, when you can have all three with the Hanes Women's Cotton Boyshort Underwear."]

I prefer underwear that is made primarily of cotton for its comfort and breathability. These fabric features are essential for me to ensure that the underwear is not only comfortable but also supportive and durable.
What specific level of coverage do you prefer in your underwear, such as full coverage, mid-rise, or low-rise styles?
